reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, On/Off Interrupter for LED and Other Lamps, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: More of an off-white. Does not exactly match ELEGRP or Lutron or even other Bestten switch products. Very odd I will post a pic with ELEGRP dimmer on the left, Bestten in the middle and Lutron Maestro timer on the right. Functionality is fine so if you only have one switch and are not trying to match anything else you're golden
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
reviews.title: Off white or bone color

reviews.text: I have been using this brand product for over a year now and have had no issues to date. I am still in the process of replacing switches, outlets (15, 20 and GFI) and all cover plates in the house. I highly recommend BESTTEN for these parts. For me they offer the best price break that I have found so far.

reviews.title: Still going strong

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, On/Off Interrupter for LED and Other Lamps, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The switch itself works good, but it's a little "squishy" it has a lot of give before the 'click'. Also, it took me all of 20 minutes just to install the faceplate because the holes didn't line up, so I used my drill to make the bottom hole bigger. Cheap parts at a cheap cost. You get what you pay for. The one good thing is that the color matches nicely. The switch itself is also loud, so if you need a quiet one, look elsewhere.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.title: Switch is good, faceplate is a no go

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, On/Off Interrupter for LED and Other Lamps, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I regret not spending more for better quality switches. These feel cheap and make a loud click when you switch them. Also, though the color said white, they are actually an off-white cream color. But they do work and look fine other than that.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2024
reviews.title: Look good, Feel and sound cheap

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, On/Off Interrupter for LED and Other Lamps, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Adding this Light Switch with Wallplate to my home was a decision I will never regret. It's not just a simple light switch but an enhancement to my room's overall aesthetics. I was particularly impressed with its sleek design. The decorator-style design seamlessly blends into the room decor, making it more than just a functional item, but also an element of design. The included wallplate was a great addition that gives the switch a clean, finished look. My Bf is an electrician and he installed them super fast. I'm changing all my light switches to this one.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.title: Makes your house look modern

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, On/Off Interrupter for LED and Other Lamps, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These are definitely only 15amp rated and definitely residential grade (not as good as commercial), but: That is what I wanted and these are decent products for 1/2 OR LESS what you would pay for a domestic model with the same specs. It's the same plastic and bent copper and spring everywhere. Totally would buy again, action is solid and they do NOT feel or appear cheap. I've had cheap domestic parts break apart on screw pressure, these held up fine going into old crowded jboxes.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.title: Great value.
